titleStmt.title: A Description of the seventeen provinces and of the province of Haynault in particular, in which is the city of Mons.
titleStmt.author: Seller, John, fl. 1658-1698.

publicationStmt.publisher: Published by John Seller, and sold by Richard Baldwin ... in ... London, and by the author at the Hermitage in Wappin,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Seller by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Item at reel 1568:10 identified as Wing D1169A (number cancelled).
Reproductions of original in the Harvard University Library.
